[20-Apr-2025 06:36:23 UTC] WordPress database error

SELECT c.id,c.name,c.description,c.image, NULL AS dt FROM wp_product_categories c, wp_item_category_associations cp, wp_product_list p WHERE c.id = cp.category_id AND cp.product_id = p.id AND c.active = 1 AND p.active = 1 GROUP BY c.id

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: SELECT c.id,c.name,c.description,c.image, NULL AS dt FROM wp_product_categories c, wp_item_category_associations cp, wp_product_list p WHERE c.id = cp.category_id AND cp.product_id = p.id AND c.active = 1 AND p.active = 1 GROUP BY c.id | (no parameters)
